description: Distance from n-th composite number (A002808) to next prime.
formula: Beginning with 2, make sequence of composites; measure distances to next prime
example: a(1)=4, composite; distance to next prime, 5, is 1.
author: _Enoch Haga_, Jan 16 2000
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 09 2011
